context: Hello! What kind of movie is your favorite?
Hi, I love Denzel Washington. Can you recommend any good movies with him in it?
resp: Oh yes, my favorite I just saw Déjà Vu (2006) and Man on Fire (2004) If you want more, I can also say Remember the Titans (2000) and John Q. (2002) They're all famous and classic
